content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I am happy to negotiate the rental price with you. Please propose a price that you think is fair for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and modern features of the apartment, I believe a price around 550 Euros per month could be reasonable for both parties.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Abbasi, but I'm afraid 550 Euros is too low given the prime location and modern features of the apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please feel free to make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In that case, Mr. Schmidt, I suggest a rental price of 625 Euros per month while maintaining the respect for the apartment's qualities. Let's see if we can find common ground here.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer is moving in the right direction, Mr. Abbasi. However, I am still looking for a higher price. I believe 650 Euros per month would be more in line with the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. Although I'm hesitant due to the excellent features and location, I'm willing to consider a rental price of 650 Euros per month for this exceptional apartment. Let's see if we can reach an agreement on this figure.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Mr. Abbasi. I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month! Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
